snippet.title: Connection: The Nightmare Within | Official Video Game Trailer (Upcoming Horror Game)
snippet.description:
Inspired by the classics such as Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Alone In the Dark: Detective Stone investigates a shadow group. Explore atmospheric levels, fight monsters, and solve puzzles. Unravel a story of twists and turns. Choose classic fixed camera, or over-the-shoulder.

In this heart-pounding horror mystery puzzle game, you'll dive headfirst into a world of horror and intrigue, stepping into the twisted mind of the antagonist using cutting-edge mind-space technology to gather clues and solve puzzles.

As you make your way through the twisted mind, you'll encounter puzzles and challenges that will test your mettle.

Choose between two camera modes to tailor your experience to your playstyle. Want a classic, old-school vibe? Go for Fixed-Cameras mode and feel that nostalgic Resident Evil energy. Or, if you're all about action and thrills, go for Over the Shoulder mode for a more modern perspective.

Are you ready to prove your skills and uncover the twisted secrets within the mind? Visit the Steam page today!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2463620/Connection_The_Nightmare_Within/
